line.comment: * DO NOT USE ARRAYS AS RETURN VALUES. USE TABLES INSTEAD.
* NOTE: [DATATYPE_TABLE] is not recognized by X-Studio. Use "if table get size: table = $return" instead.

line.text: 'Loop Production has stopped. But must finish last crafting batch of '

line.comment: * $amount = $ship-> get true amount of ware $resource in cargo bay

line.text: 'START Loop Production (can only be stopped here)'

line.comment: * add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$t

line.text: 'Only one order at a time. Cycle is in seconds. Manufacturing is a one way process. Factories are more efficient.'
'Single order: Ship must keep still while working. Resources will be lost if it gets interrupted.'
'Loop production: Ship can do anything. Internal factory works automatically in the background.'
'Loop production does not stop when running out of resources. Can only be turned off in this screen.'
'Tip: for a constant supply of resources you can use the Courier command.'

sval.val: Loop Production has stopped. But must finish last crafting batch of
START Loop Production (can only be stopped here)
Only one order at a time. Cycle is in seconds. Manufacturing is a one way process. Factories are more efficient.
Single order: Ship must keep still while working. Resources will be lost if it gets interrupted.
Loop production: Ship can do anything. Internal factory works automatically in the background.
Loop production does not stop when running out of resources. Can only be turned off in this screen.
Tip: for a constant supply of resources you can use the Courier command.
DO NOT USE ARRAYS AS RETURN VALUES. USE TABLES INSTEAD.
NOTE: [DATATYPE_TABLE] is not recognized by X-Studio. Use "if table get size: table = $return" instead.
$amount = $ship-> get true amount of ware $resource in cargo bay
add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$t
